abstract: An anchor location at the knuckle of the index finger.
overview:
## Discussion

Content anchored this way has its positive y-axis in the direction of the fingernail’s normal and its positive z-axis pointing towards the side where the thumb is.

# indexFingerKnuckle

**Type Property**

An anchor location at the knuckle of the index finger.

## Declaration

```swift
static let indexFingerKnuckle: AnchoringComponent.Target.HandLocation.HandJoint
```

## Discussion

Content anchored this way has its positive y-axis in the direction of the fingernail’s normal and its positive z-axis pointing towards the side where the thumb is.
